[[File:QuestPoint.png|thumb|200px|A Quest Point]]
==Description== Quest Points {{Questpoints}} are the green currency earned by completing [[Quests]].
==Uses==
===Key Items===

==Regional Walkthroughs== ===Kanto===
Summary: Without using the [[Underground]] to mine stones and using typed eggs, 74200 Quest Points are needed. Using Mystery Eggs, Mining for stones, [[Rare hold items]], Minimum [[Safari Zone]] clears, and [[Berries]] 30,000 Quest Points are needed.
